definition: a bout of drinking or drug taking, cut teeth into
details:
noun
- a bout of drinking or drug taking
- a flap along the edge of a garment
= synonyms: dag
- a slit in a garment that exposes material of a different color underneath
- a sharp projection on an edge or surface
= example: a sharp projection on an edge or surface
verb
- cut teeth into
= example: cut teeth into
